title: Moving pictures: the art of Jan Lenica
creator_credit: Phoenix Films, Robert Gardner and Richard Rogers
brief_description: Gives insight into the patience, care and concentration that allows Lenica to conquer the processes of animating his pictures. Shows Lenica at work on “Landscapes” at Harvard and explores the relationship of the artist with his “real” world at the moments when he conjures his fantasy visions.
